import React from 'react' import { Card , CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import {Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "./tour-card.css"; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id , title, city, photo , price , featured , reviews}= tour const totalRating = reviews?.reduce((acc, item)=> acc+item) return (
{featured && Featured}
{city} {avgRating} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price }/mỗi người
) }; export default TourCard
